channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Geekom's new laptop offers a bright and wide screen, impressive hardware - and weighs less than a bag of sugar
item.description: Geekom GeekBook X14 Pro delivers an ultra-light design, Intel Core Ultra performance, OLED display, and long battery life.

item.title: YouTube is working on a feature that will fix the messy home feed
item.description: YouTube is experimenting with a new feature that allows users to customize their home feed.

item.title: Possible Windows 11 bug with Nvidia GPUs tanks Assassin's Creed Shadows performance, bringing even an RTX 5090 to its knees
item.description: Nvidia recently issued a hotfix for a bug possibly caused by the Windows 11 October update, but it wasn't clear just how bad this glitch was.

item.title: It’s Good That the ‘Destiny 2’ Jedi Proxy Also Kind of Sounds Like They Suck
item.description: If the 'Destiny 2' expansion's 'Star Wars' crossover means it wants to tell a story that captures the vibe of the galaxy far, far away, then it's doing a good job so far with the Praxic Order.

item.title: RAM price rise hell is making me think the unthinkable – could the PS5 be a better buy than a Steam Machine?
item.description: I just bought a PS5 Pro in the Black Friday sales, and hearing this news has made me feel even better about my purchase.

item.title: Our favorite elite Hi-Res music player has a record-low Black Friday deal – are you ready to go audiophile?
item.description: One of our favorite players from one of our favorite audio brands just got a very rare price cut

item.title: Black Friday is the best time to get Samsung's stunning Frame TV - shop record low prices from $697.99
item.description: For Black Friday, you can get Samsung’s The Frame TV or The Frame Pro at the lowest price we’ve tracked. In fact, for most sizes, Amazon is actually a few dollars cheaper than buying from Samsung directly.

item.title: A New Way to Ruin Thanksgiving: Making AI Slop Recipes
item.description: Innovation at the dinner table.

item.title: Retro computer boffin creates an all-new perforated tape reader - just don't expect high data reading speeds
item.description: Skyriver created a small optical tape reader using simple components, achieving steady results despite slow speeds and narrow practical use.

item.title: Elon Musk Said Grok’s Roasts Would Be ‘Epic’ at Parties—So I Tried It on My Coworkers
item.description: It went about as well as you’d expect.

item.title: The Home Depot is giving away free cordless tools for Black Friday: See the top BOGO deals
item.description: The Home Depot has some fantastic offers and buy-one-get-one deals for Black Friday shoppers. Here's how to get free cordless tools this Cyber Week.

item.title: $11 Million Crypto Theft in Broad Daylight Is Latest in Increasingly Common $5 Wrench Attacks
item.description: It's cheaper than ever to turn antisocial behavior into big bucks.

item.title: Black Friday Florida VPN deals: perfect for privacy in the panhandle
item.description: From Tallahassee to Tampa, surf safe down South

item.title: Black Friday: SharkNinja is giving away high-value free gifts just for buying these Shark or Ninja gadgets on sale
item.description: Shopping directly from SharkNinja over Amazon unlocks discounts on gadgets like the Ninja Slushi and Shark Glam, plus free gifts up to $299 in value.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: Gemini 3 Release, Nvidia Earnings, Epstein Files Fallout
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we cover the news of the week and take a closer look at the Gemini 3, Google’s latest AI model and chatbot.

item.title: Character AI will offer interactive ‘Stories’ to kids instead of open-ended chat
item.description: The company announced last month that it would no longer allow minors to use its chat features.

item.title: The 25 best Advent calendars to buy in November. Take advantage of early Black Friday sales.
item.description: Some of the season's best Advent calendars are already on sale ahead of Black Friday. Pick up popular gifts from Kiehl's, Lego, Bloomingdales, and Sephora.

item.title: Relive the First Flight of NASA’s ‘Quiet’ Supersonic Jet With This Thrilling Video
item.description: X-59 is designed to achieve supersonic speeds without all that noise.

item.title: David Sacks tried to kill state AI laws — and it blew up in his face
item.description: On Wednesday, a rumor began popping up in Washington about a momentous policy change: the White House, it was said, would issue an executive order on Friday that would finally preempt state AI laws, handing over those regulatory powers to the federal government. The minute it leaked online, lawyers and policymakers began to scour every […]

item.title: ‘Wednesday’ Casts a Goth Icon to Play the Mysterious Aunt Ophelia
item.description: Eva Green, star of 'Penny Dreadful,' as well as Tim Burton's 'Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children' and 'Dark Shadows,' has joined season three of the Netflix series.

item.title: Le Huawei Mate 80 prouve une chose : quand ils arrêtent de copier, ils font des choses incroyables
item.description: Vous pensiez que la course aux chiffres était terminée ? Huawei vient de remettre une pièce dans la machine. Avec le Mate 80 Pro Max, on parle de 20 Go de RAM, de deux téléobjectifs périscopiques et d'un écran plus lumineux que votre téléviseur.

item.title: 85 Black Friday deals: We found record-low prices on AirPods, MacBooks, TCL TVs, Kindles, and Ninjas
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: Best gift ideas for the woman in your life that are more than just another bathrobe
item.description: Shop home, tech, and beauty gifts for the lucky lady in your life.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Season One arrives soon and adds one of the coolest maps I've seen in Call of Duty
item.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season One drops next week and it's one of the biggest updates in series history.

item.title: Warner Music Group partners with Suno to offer AI likenesses of its artists
item.description: Warner Music Group has struck a licensing deal with the AI music creation platform Suno. Under the agreement, WMG will allow users to create AI-generated music on Suno using the voices, names, likenesses, images, and compositions of artists who opt in to the program. WMG, which owns record labels that have signed musicians like Ed […]

item.title: Dick’s joins growing list of companies trimming subsidiary brands with Foot Locker closures
item.description: The retailer says shuttering locations is part of a one-time reset designed to keep Foot Locker from weighing down earnings in 2026. Dick’s Sporting Goods (NYSE: DKS) announced it will close select Foot Locker stores and raised its full-year year outlook, in its third quarter earnings report on Tuesday.

item.title: Huawei a osé ce qu’Apple refuse de faire avec l’iPad Pro et c’est brillant, voici la MatePad Edge
item.description: endant qu'Apple bride ses puces M4 dans des iPad sans ventilateur, Huawei prend le chemin inverse. La nouvelle MatePad Edge débarque avec une promesse simple : des performances maintenues grâce à un système de refroidissement liquide inédit.
